main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.dataserver

Interface DataServerConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockDataServer, WebServerConnector

    public interface DataServerConnector
    Defines an interface used to access a remote server for retrieving data about clients
    Author:
    Psymj1 (Marcus)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAvailable() 
      Meeting retreiveMeetingData(java.lang.String meetingID)
      Uses the given meetingID to retrieve information about the related meeting from the data server.
      User retrieveUserData(java.lang.String token)
      Uses the given token to retrieve information about the related user from the data server

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Returns:
        True if the validation server is currently reachable false if not

      • retrieveUserData

        User retrieveUserData(java.lang.String token)
               throws InvalidTokenException,
                      ServerUnavailableException
        Uses the given token to retrieve information about the related user from the data server
        Parameters:
        token - The Authentication Token to use to access the data
        Returns:
        The User information if the token is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - If the token supplied is invalid
        ServerUnavailableException - If the data server isn't currently available

      • retreiveMeetingData

        Meeting retreiveMeetingData(java.lang.String meetingID)
                     throws InvalidMeetingIDException,
                            ServerUnavailableException
        Uses the given meetingID to retrieve information about the related meeting from the data server. Note the data server may not keep information such as the number of current participants in the meeting
        Parameters:
        meetingID - The meeting ID to use
        Returns:
        The meeting information if the meetingID is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidMeetingIDException - If the meetingID supplied isn't valid
        ServerUnavailableException - If the data server isn't currently available
